articles.description: GAZA: Gaza‚Äôs civil defense agency said Israeli forces killed at least 36 Palestinians on Saturday, six of them in a shooting near a US-backed aid distribution center. articles.title: Dawn French sorry for 'one-sided' Gaza war video
articles.description: The video sparked a backlash with critics accusing her of appearing to "mock" the 7 October 2023 attack.
articles.content:
In the 40-second video, posted earlier this week, the Vicar of Dibley star shared her views on the ongoing war, saying: "Complicated, no, but nuanced. But [the] bottom line is no."

articles.title: Second boy dies after M4 slip road minibus crash
articles.description: Othniel Adoma, 11, has died more than three weeks after a minibus overturned on the M4 near Reading.
articles.content:
An 11-year-old boy has become the second child to die after a minibus overturned on a motorway slip road.
Othniel Adoma, from Bracknell, Berkshire, died on Thursday, more than three weeks after the single-vehicle crash, said police.

articles.content:

articles.title: Doctors raise alarm over rise in brain tumour cases

articles.content:
